title: LOST BLUE ESSENCE
body: LOST 10000 BLUE ESSENCE AFTER PRE SEASON UPDATE. VERY MAD. PLEASE HELP MEH. NOT HAPPY. IT SAID IP UP THE TOP INSTEAD OF ESSENCE EVEN AFTER I UPDATED, I PLAYED THE GAME FOR THE ESSENCE ORB AND OPENED IT FOR 10000 BLUE ESSENCE BUT IT DIDNT GO THROUGH. ARGHHHHHJDJDJSHDJSHDJSHDJHSJDHJSHDJSDHJSHCHXGSHUBXHVXCTADFGUGCFXYAXFUAJ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Same happened to me
17000 blue essense
you prob got something but didnt see the notification as the screen freezes/doesnt show anything, like when mystery boxes glitch when you open them
